content: materials - 4 mm crochet hook us g - 100 % cotton yarn for a 4 mm hook - fluffy yarn like chenille i used one ball of katia bambi to be used also with a 4 mm hook - a pair of 10 mm safety eyes - a tiny bit of brown yarn to embroider the mouth - tapestry needle - polyfiber fill note i used 100% cotton for the skin and chenille for the fur but if you want to crochet your monkey using only cotton yarn it will turn out very lovely all the same so don t worry if you can t find chenille
